title: Beyond Lies The Wub
description: This is a story. Story Collection with the same name is available here:  ISBN  9781857988796"The wub, sir," Peterson said. "It spoke!"  The slovenly wub might well have said: Many men talk like philosophers and live like fools. Science Fiction – Alien Life and InteractionBeyond Lies the Wub was Philip K. Dick's first published story and appeared in the legendary ”Planet Stories” pulp magazine.
author: Philip K. Dick
